intro: Oxydectes matourensis, commonly known as the Matourensis Oxeye, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features showy yellow flowers with a central disk, typical of the genus Oxydectes. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
